data.text: @IMAO_ @OldManBody Not to mention that the virus isn’t a big problem anymore
@IMAO_ It was never the time to have mask mandates
@IMAO_ Going by the graph, the decision should've been made in October.

@IMAO_ Masks never worked! Mandates were worthless! Military grade gas mask, better than we civies can get, gi down to .3 microns. COVID virus is .1 micron. The average face diaper cant stop basic dust. Masks dont work!

@fundamental3C @IMAO_ @redsteeze Or, in other words: the situation is quite a bit more complex than you've been lead to believe. Despite some politicians doing dumb things, the recommendations (masks/distancing/handwashing/vaccines/no large gatherings) have been demonstrably effective.

Hope you have a nice day.
@IMAO_ There was never a need for masks in the first place

@fundamental3C @IMAO_ @redsteeze Surviving the virus was high. Surviving it without permanent damage was significantly less so. Something like 11% of cases required ventilators - something they wouldn't have access to if the hospitals were overwhelmed.

Lowering the curve was to ensure that didn't happen.
@IMAO_ But why have we done so little to improve ventilation and filtration so it’s safer not to have a mask?
